00027 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"
00028 
00029 #include "BKE_global.h"
00030 
00031 #include "BLI_math.h"
00032 
00033 #include "bmesh.h"
00034 #include "intern/bmesh_operators_private.h" /* own include */
00035 
00036 #define EDGE_MARK 1
00037 #define VERT_MARK 2
00038 
00039 /*
00040  * Slides a vertex along a connected edge
00041  *
00042  */
00043 void bmo_vertex_slide_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00044 {
00045     BMOIter oiter;
00046     BMIter iter;
00047     BMHeader *h;
00048     BMVert *vertex;
00049     BMEdge *edge;
00050     BMEdge *slide_edge;
00051 
00052     /* Selection counts */
00053     int selected_edges = 0;
00054 
00055     /* Get slide amount */
00056     const float distance_t = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "distance_t");
00057 
00058     /* Get start vertex */
00059     vertex = BMO_iter_new(&oiter, bm, op, "vert", BM_VERT);
00060 
00061 
00062     if (!vertex) {
00063         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) {
00064             fprintf(stderr, "vertex_slide: No vertex selected...");
00065         }
00066         BMO_error_raise(bm, op, BMERR_INVALID_SELECTION, "Vertex Slide Error: Invalid selection.");
00067         return;
00068     }
00069 
00070     /* Count selected edges */
00071     BMO_ITER (h, &oiter, bm, op, "edge", BM_VERT | BM_EDGE) {
00072         switch (h->htype) {
00073             case BM_EDGE:
00074                 selected_edges++;
00075                 /* Mark all selected edges (cast BMHeader->BMEdge) */
00076                 BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, (BMElemF *)h, EDGE_MARK);
00077                 break;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081     /* Only allow sliding if an edge is selected */
00082     if (selected_edges == 0) {
00083         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG) {
00084             fprintf(stderr, "vertex_slide: select a single edge\n");
00085         }
00086         BMO_error_raise(bm, op, BMERR_INVALID_SELECTION, "Vertex Slide Error: Invalid selection.");
00087         return;
00088     }
00089 
00090     /* Make sure we get the correct edge. */
00091     BM_ITER_ELEM (edge, &iter, vertex, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00092         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, edge, EDGE_MARK) && BM_vert_in_edge(edge, vertex)) {
00093             slide_edge = edge;
00094             break;
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     /* Found edge */
00099     if (slide_edge) {
00100         BMVert *other = BM_edge_other_vert(slide_edge, vertex);
00101 
00102         /* mark */
00103         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, vertex, VERT_MARK);
00104 
00105         /* Interpolate */
00106         interp_v3_v3v3(vertex->co, vertex->co, other->co, distance_t);
00107     }
00108 
00109     /* Return the new edge. The same previously marked with VERT_MARK */
00110     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "vertout", BM_VERT, VERT_MARK);
00111     return;
00112 }
00113 
00114 #undef EDGE_MARK
00115 #undef VERT_MARK
